description: Application to approve details of conditions 5 (Refuse Storage), 6 (Bicycle Storage), 7 (Parking Permits) and 8 (Car Park Management) pursuant to application 23/00854/FUL for Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to vary condition 2 (Approved Drawings) to provide revised plans altering 2 proposed flats of planning permission Ref: 22/01963/FUL for the change of use of rear of vacant commercial ground floor premises (retaining vacant ground floor commercial space at the front of the building) to enable 2 apartments to be provided (1 one bedroom two person flat and 1 studio flat) including moving existing retaining wall at rear of site to provide amenity space for proposed flats.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
